Text: Start the New Year the Right Way and SaveDear GERALD NEMEC Heres an offer that will be hard to beat Update that address book and be ready for Take advantage of our UNLIMITED INSTANT hr People Locate Search regularly priced at were giving extra hours of searching in addition to the hrs AND OFF for the discounted price of From the moment you purchase you will have hours of unlimited searching hours plus hours free Take advantage of this promotion before the nd of January when this offer will expire To start please visit kc Our services range from basic people locate searches to comprehensive background checks Prices start as low as If you would like more detailed information on the various searches we offer please feel free to visit our website atkc In addition to ordering our products online you may place an order by calling a Search Specialist at They will assist you with all of your search needs Payments may be made by credit card money order check by phone or Western Union Heres what people are saying about US SEARCH At first I tried to use the free search databases on the Internet However after a couple of hours I saw that I was running around in circles and their data was either incorrect or lacking You located the individual that I was seeking and even supplied me with a correct phone number Thanks a million MS I wanted to tell you that I was so impressed with my US SEARCH You found my long lost father in less than hours of my order I had hired a private investigator for and he couldnt find anything Thank you so much I am so pleased with you guys and will refer you to others that need your assistance My reunion with my father has also been a blessing Thank you JP To take advantage of this special offer please visit kc Thank you US SEARCH Unsubscribe information You are receiving this email because you opted to receive special offers from US SEARCHcom Please DO NOT reply to this email To Unsubscribe please visit kc IMAGE
